frame.name: Relational_political_locales
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Locale</fen> is defined politically to be the head of state of another, larger political locale, the <fen>Container_possessor</fen>.
<ex>She had repeatedly been to the <t><fex name="Locale">capital</fex></t> <fex name="Container_possessor">of the nation</fex>, and there had met with a reception none too cordial.</ex>
<ex>He decided to stay in the <t><fex name="Locale">capital</fex></t> <fex name="Container_possessor">of Iraq</fex> for two months while he recuperated to fight another day.</ex>
<ex>The largest city in the area, <fex name="Locale">Oakland</fex> <m>is</m> the <t>county seat</t> <fex name="Container_possessor">of Alameda county</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Constituent_parts
FE.definition: <def-root>The materials or <fen>Constituent_parts</fen> that make up a <fen>Locale</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>The political locale that the <fen>Locale</fen> is a the head of. <ex>People come from all over the nation to work in and visit the <t>capital</t> <fex name="ContP">of the United States</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Locale
FE.definition:
<def-root>The politically or administratively-defined locale that functions as the head of state for the containing entity.
<ex>Most of the major government buildings are in the center of the <fex name="Lcl"><t>capital</t></fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE is used for the Names of Locales.
<ex>Gyeonggi Province is located in the west-central area of the Korean Peninsula, and surrounds the Korean <t>capital</t> <fex name="Name">of Seoul</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition:
<def-root>A place that the <fen>Locale</fen> is located with respect to.
<ex>All the <t>capitals</t> <fex name="RelLoc">in Canada</fex> are clean.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description, characteristic, or property of the <fen>Locale</fen> which is not covered by more specific FEs.
<ex>He essentially was the head of the <fex name="des">largest</fex> <t>county seat</t> <fex name="des">in northern California</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Population
FE.definition: <def-root>The people living in the jurisdiction of the locale, typically expressed with a PP-<ment>of</ment>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: capital.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the governmental or administrative head city of a region.

lexUnit.name: county seat.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the town that is the administrative capital of a county.

lexUnit.name: see.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the place in which a cathedral church stands, identified as the seat of authority of a bishop or archbishop.
